related_questions.question:
5. Complete the table with the comparative and     superlative form
No. Adjectives Comparative Superlative
1. high
2. low
3.
thin
4.
interesting
5.
expensive​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

1. high (adjective)

higher (comparative)

highest (superlative)

2. low (adjective)

lower (comparative)

lowest (superlative)

3. thin (adjective)

thinner (comparative)

thinnest (superlative)

4. interesting (adjective)

more interesting (comparative)

most interesting (superlative)

5. expensive (adjective)

more expensive (comparative)

most expensive (superlative)

Semoga terbantu, maap kalo salah✌

related_questions.question: Make your own paragraph about your activity in the past. start from 'a long time ago'​

answers.answer: a long time ago i was playing in the backyard. playing with mud and grass to be exactly, i ended up playing for 2 hours straight and imagining things, when i got up my whole outfit was under the mud. i had to take a shower

C. he is reserving a ticket.
